::: {#hero-heading}

Evan Fan Zhang is a lecturer at Zhejiang Wanli University. He obtained a Ph.D. in Economics from the Institute of Intellectual Property, Xiamen University in 2025.

His current research focuses on innovation economics, digital economy, and urban economics. Evan is passionate about observing economic and business phenomena in daily life and is enthusiastic about applying new technologies such as NLP to practical economic and business problems.

He has published academic papers in 《数量经济技术经济研究》 (Journal of Quantitative & Technical Economics), Economic Analysis and Policy, and Technological and Economic Development of Economy, among other CSSCI and SSCI indexed journals.

## Background

- 2025-Present: Lecturer, Department of Business Administration, School of Logistics and E-commerce, Zhejiang Wanli University
- 2021-2025: Ph.D. in Economics, Institute of Intellectual Property, Xiamen University, China, specializing in Intellectual Property Management
- 2018-2021: M.A. in Economics, School of Economics, Zhejiang Gongshang University, China, majoring in Industrial Economics
- 2013-2017: B.A. in Economics, School of Finance, Capital University of Economics and Business, China, majoring in Financial Engineering
